scripts.build:em: mkdir -p ./game/build/web && cd ./game/build/web && cmake -G 'Unix Makefiles' -o bla.html -DASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_TOOLS=OFF  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=~/Projects/emsdk/fastcomp/emscripten/cmake/Modules/Platform/Emscripten.cmake ../../ && make
